title: Commission
overview: Christ's command to make disciples of all nations
key_application: Participate in Christ's mission to the world
prayerPoints: Thank God for including us in His mission
Pray for boldness to share the gospel
Ask for wisdom in making disciples
Pray for the spread of the gospel worldwide

Introduction.question: What does it mean to be on mission with God?
Introduction.answer: Guide discussion toward understanding God's mission.

Introduction.question: How do you see yourself as part of God's mission?
Introduction.answer: Explain the concept of being sent by God.

Introduction.question: What role does the church play in God's mission?
Introduction.answer: Discuss the church's role in fulfilling God's mission.

Matthew 28:18-20.question: What authority does Jesus claim in this passage?
Matthew 28:18-20.answer: All authority in heaven and on earth.

Matthew 28:18-20.question: How does this passage define the church's mission?
Matthew 28:18-20.answer: To make disciples of all nations.

Matthew 28:18-20.question: What does it mean to make disciples?
Matthew 28:18-20.answer: To help others follow Jesus in all of life.

Matthew 28:18-20.question: How does this passage show God's presence in mission?
Matthew 28:18-20.answer: Through the promise of His presence with us.

Matthew 28:18-20.question: What does it mean to teach others to obey?
Matthew 28:18-20.answer: To help others live out Jesus' teachings.

Application.question: How can you participate in God's mission?
Application.answer: Suggest practical ways to engage in mission.

Application.question: What specific opportunities do you have to make disciples?
Application.answer: Help identify specific opportunities for disciple-making.

Application.question: How can you grow in your ability to teach others?
Application.answer: Discuss ways to grow in teaching and mentoring skills.

Application.question: What steps can you take to be more mission-minded?
Application.answer: Encourage intentional steps toward mission involvement.

Application.question: How can you help others understand their role in mission?
Application.answer: Share strategies for mobilizing others for mission.
